definitions: the action of improving or enhancing the quality or value of something

examples.text: enrichment of the soil for more plant growth
environments where youth can experience cultural enrichment

shortDefinitions: action of improving or enhancing the quality or value of something

definitions: the action of increasing the proportion of a particular isotope in an element, especially that of the isotope U-235 in uranium so as to make it suitable for use in a nuclear reactor or weapon

examples.text: a centrifuge plant for uranium enrichment
the enrichment process used to make nuclear fuel rods

shortDefinitions: increase in proportion of particular isotope in element

definitions: the process of making someone wealthy or wealthier

examples.text: the policy was denounced as a means of enrichment of a small elite

shortDefinitions: process of making someone wealthy or wealthier
